title: Mobile Mathematics Microlearning Design for Strengthening Learner Agency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding and applying basic mathematical concepts in professional contexts
context.additional_context: A self-directed learning environment for working professionals using personal devices outside work hours.

learning_goals: Learners can independently select and apply strategies to solve job-related mathematical problems with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can record their progress rate at 100% in the mobile system during the learning process
Learners can revise and improve their learning plans at least once based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
